name: image-cropper
title: Image Cropper
description: Crop images to 800x600 dimensions from center
content:
Overview

This application crops images to 800x600 dimensions from the center. Built using Pillow, it extracts the central portion of your image for a focused view.

Features

  • Crops to 800x600 pixels from center
  • Preserves original image quality
  • Automatically adjusts if image is smaller than target
  • Maintains original file format

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a cropped image with the suffix _cropped in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Extracting center portion of large images
  • Creating uniform thumbnail views
  • Removing unwanted edges or borders
  • Focusing on central subjects
